name: Space Bounce
summary: We present you the hyper/super/duper/x-tra game, the boredom killer and the mental pain maker, Space Bounce. It's a simple game, with simple mechanics and a simple purpose: to score the highest score. All you have to do is to dodge the asteroids and the planets, and if you hit them, you will lose some hp (which is in the left of the screen), but if you do not you may conquer the Space!
